website_summaries.verdict: A good basic broadhead that is extremely durable for heavy-duty use.
pros: Uses a retracting mechanism for the three blades for safe storage when not in use
Blades eliminate the need for separate O-rings during heavy acceleration

customer_reviews.title: Best Mechanical Broadhead
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been bow hunting with Excalibur cross bows over 5 years. I have bought other brands at the store since they are cheaper, but not happy with anything except Excalibur. I usually discard the point after shooting a deer and use a new one since I can afford it.
customer_reviews.author: Lew Larson, DMD

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and very effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve taken two deer this season, one at 20 yards and one at 50 with a 22” bolt and my crossbow at 375 FPS. On both the bolt passed all the way through leaving large blood trails. Neither deer made it 50 yards. I already ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Tatman

customer_reviews.title: Wicked
customer_reviews.text: These broadheads stop deer in their tracks . I never have to track the deer cause they bleed out quickly. Excalibur always has great products.
customer_reviews.author: Cold Iron

customer_reviews.title: Still I think they shoot good even when open
customer_reviews.text: This product worked sometimes. The commercials and advertisements for this broadhead claimed that the mechanical blades stay forward until they at least leave the bow. This is not the case, at least on mine. Still I think they shoot good even when open.
customer_reviews.author: Charles White

customer_reviews.title: No Worries
customer_reviews.text: 40 yards .. True and straight.. blood trail was 3' wide of a fine mist of spatter.. exit hole was like "seriously" . Dead Deer running was about 70 yards.. Impact sounded like a cannon... all blades were exposed. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: taepple

customer_reviews.title: Good...but missing pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I think the broadheads are just fine, and they'll work good. Except, that two of the three of them were missing the required stop collars. Did someone previously return these and keep what they needed? Not sure. I hate to say it, but I'll order another set to see if all the required pieces are included this time.
customer_reviews.author: NoMIFish

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Broadheads
customer_reviews.text: Use with my Excalibur crossbow. In the last couple of season I harvested 14 whitetails that ran less than 100 yards. The broadheads opened every time . They have never opened prematurely @ 405 fps. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit right, fly right
customer_reviews.text: I use these with the Firebolts on my Xcal Axiom. The POI is the same as with my field points and they don't require the rubber brans like others due. The click and lock feature is great. I have 6 firebolts loaded with them. I'll update my review after archery season.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: No deployment
customer_reviews.text: Blades never deployed upon impact. Luckily the shot was perfect and didn't matter but very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brian Br

customer_reviews.title: Excaliber X-Act Broadheads
customer_reviews.text: Received the broadheads and as usual for Excalibur, they were of good quality like everything else they sell. Saving them for hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: dynamo

customer_reviews.title: Great broadheads
customer_reviews.text: I could not ask for a better product. Items were received 3 days ahead of estimated shipping. Company did a great job and very impressed. The broadheads have done what they needed and I have harvested 2 deer already. Fly true and hit within 1/4" of my field point impacts. I would recommend company and broadheads.
customer_reviews.author: jason d

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on my first shot, dropped the deer in its tracks!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Opperman

customer_reviews.title: Excalibur makes good stuff at reasonable prices
customer_reviews.text: Same point of aim as field points. Excalibur makes good stuff at reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hempel

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price and my husband was excited for this Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Marebear

customer_reviews.title: but they had included a rubber band around the blades like regular such heads
customer_reviews.text: Bought a three pack of these. One of them had loose blades when closed. I contacted Exclibur and they said they'd send another. The replacement one had loose blades too, but they had included a rubber band around the blades like regular such heads, even though excalibur's claim to fame on these mechanaical heads was that they were rubber band-less.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Nelson

customer_reviews.title: They worked very well on my first deer with a ...
customer_reviews.text: They worked very well on my first deer with a crossbow.The bolt passed thru the hart. The deer only ran 30-yards.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for croossbow.
customer_reviews.text: Accurate like field tip.So far shot 3 deer in 25 yards. or less they were down.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Morosky

customer_reviews.title: Does not deploy
customer_reviews.text: Shot two deer with these and they did not deploy. Very disappointed, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Design!
customer_reviews.text: Typical Excalibur quality (outstanding)! Not much of a review....haven't used these for hunting. The cutting edges and point, of these heads, are keenly sharp. The blades fold forward and detent pressure holds them into the aerodynamic flight position, retaining accuracy. Loss of accuracy can be a problem with standard broadheads. The forward tips, of the folded blades, are blunt on the exposed forward facing edge. On impact, this blunt area resists penetration for a micro-second, instantly deploying the blades causing a large wound channel. The quality, of these heads, is really good and they are built with very good materials. Will be getting more of these. Expensive, but seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Roy C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Haven't got uses out of as of yet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I wanted what was designed for my Xbow, I'll give more review once used! Til then y0!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Fester

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Shot a little high on quartering deer20 yards. Bolt entered in just back from left shoulder, bolt penetrated all the way through body, stuck in back leg severing main artery in back right leg. Didn't go 20 yards. Other shots in the bread basket, deer don't go very far and blood trail is easy to follow. What's funny is when I bought my Excalibur package came with fixed 3 point, called Excalibur and they said don't need expandables. Trip to Bass Pro and there they were; 3 pack of Excaliber expandables. Oh well, I guess we all can learn.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Unbelievable Broadhead!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought from another supplier but what an awesome broadhead. Same day I put it on I seen a doe at 41 yards. Put a perfect heart shot on the doe from a Excalibur Vortex, arrow used was the Excalibur Firebolt I bought off of Amazon. Doe dropped in less than 20 yards and the damage and blood loss caused from this broadhead was just unbelievable!!!! Have not ever had any issues with any Excalibur products will always recommend Excalibur!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle customer.

product_meta.title: Excalibur X-Act 100 Grain 3-Blade Mechanical Broadhead (Pack of 3)
product_meta.description:
This item made by Excalibur crossbow is the perfect crossbow arrows to meet the demand for high quality crossbow products. The X-ACT broadhead 6672 100gr 1 7/16 diam is made using state of the art durable materials to ensure a long lasting life for each product. Get one today

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This 100 grain, 1-7/16" cut broadhead is designed for the hunter who wants maximum velocity from their crossbow but refuses to accept less than outstanding accuracy. The X-Act broadhead's "Clip-Loc" blade control system holds blades securely during a crossbow's explosive acceleration eliminating the need for "O-rings" or rubber bands, but deploying the blades reliably on impact. Model 6672.
feature_bullets: Mechanical blades open to cut upon impact
Clip Loc'' blade control uses no O-rings or bands
